name: CoreDNS (Prometheus)
description: A dashboard for CoreDNS based on metrics sent to New Relic using Prometheus Agent or Prometheus server.

rawConfiguration.text:
![CoreDNS Logo](https://i.imgur.com/2P3A2zF.png) 

### Overview
[coreDNS](https://github.com/coredns/coredns) is a fast and flexible DNS server/forwarder. The key word here is *flexible*, with CoreDNS you are able to do what you want with your DNS data by utilizing plugins. If some functionality is not provided out of the box you can add it by [writing a plugin](https://coredns.io/explugins). CoreDNS is a [Cloud Native Computing Foundation](https://cncf.io) graduated project.
- - -
### About this Dashboard

- For information on the prerequisites for this dashboard, please visit the documentation [here](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/prometheus-integrations/integrations-list/core-dns-integration).
- For more information on how to send Prometheus metrics to New Relic using Prometheus Agent or Prometheus Server, visit the documentation [here](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/prometheus-integrations/get-started/send-prometheus-metric-data-new-relic/)

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM (
	SELECT 
		latest(version) as 'corednsversion',
		latest(up) as 'corednsup',
		sum(coredns_panics_total) as 'corednspanics'
	FROM Metric
	WHERE metricName in ('coredns_build_info','up','coredns_panics_total')
		and instrumentation.name = 'remote-write'
		and (app_kubernetes_io_name = 'coredns' or app_newrelic_io_name = 'coredns' or k8s_app = 'kube-dns' or job = 'coredns')
	facet instance, prometheus_server, cluster_name limit max
	) 
SELECT sum(corednsup) as 'Instances Up', sum(corednspanics) as 'Panics' where prometheus_server IN ( {{ prometheus_server }} ) facet corednsversion as 'CoreDNS Version', prometheus_server as 'Prometheus Server' limit max

SELECT rate(sum(process_cpu_seconds_total), 1 SECONDS) * 1000 FROM Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name = 'coredns' or app_newrelic_io_name = 'coredns' or k8s_app = 'kube-dns' or job = 'coredns') and prometheus_server IN ( {{ prometheus_server }} ) and instance IN ( {{ instance }} ) facet concat(prometheus_server,' - ', instance) TIMESERIES

SELECT rate(sum(coredns_dns_requests_total), 1 SECONDS) as 'Requests' FROM Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name = 'coredns' or app_newrelic_io_name = 'coredns' or k8s_app = 'kube-dns' or job = 'coredns') and prometheus_server IN ( {{ prometheus_server }} ) and instance IN ( {{ instance }} ) FACET concat(prometheus_server, ' - ', instance) LIMIT 100 timeseries

SELECT histogrampercentile(coredns_dns_request_duration_seconds_bucket, (95)) as '95%ile' FROM Metric where (app_kubernetes_io_name = 'coredns' or app_newrelic_io_name = 'coredns' or k8s_app = 'kube-dns' or job = 'coredns') and prometheus_server IN ( {{ prometheus_server }} ) and instance IN ( {{ instance }} ) FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance,' : ',server, ',',zone) LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 300000 SLIDE BY 30000

SELECT average(go_memstats_alloc_bytes) / 1000 / 1000 FROM Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name = 'coredns' or app_newrelic_io_name = 'coredns' or k8s_app = 'kube-dns' or job = 'coredns') and prometheus_server IN ( {{ prometheus_server }} ) and instance IN ( {{ instance }} ) FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance) LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 300000 SLIDE BY 60000

SELECT rate(sum(coredns_dns_requests_total), 1 SECONDS) FROM Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name = 'coredns' or app_newrelic_io_name = 'coredns' or k8s_app = 'kube-dns' or job = 'coredns') and prometheus_server IN ( {{ prometheus_server }} ) and instance IN ( {{ instance }} ) FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance, ' , ', proto) LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 300000 SLIDE BY 30000

SELECT rate(sum(coredns_dns_requests_total), 1 SECONDS) FROM Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name = 'coredns' or app_newrelic_io_name = 'coredns' or k8s_app = 'kube-dns' or job = 'coredns') and prometheus_server IN ( {{ prometheus_server }} ) and instance IN ( {{ instance }} ) FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance, ' , type: ', type) LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 300000 SLIDE BY 30000

SELECT histogrampercentile(coredns_dns_request_size_bytes_bucket, (100 * 0.95)) FROM Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' where proto = 'udp' and (app_kubernetes_io_name = 'coredns' or app_newrelic_io_name = 'coredns' or k8s_app = 'kube-dns' or job = 'coredns') and prometheus_server IN ( {{ prometheus_server }} ) and instance IN ( {{ instance }} ) FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance, ' , 95th%') LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 300000 SLIDE BY 30000

SELECT histogrampercentile(coredns_dns_request_size_bytes_bucket, (100 * 0.50)) FROM Metric where proto = 'udp' and (app_kubernetes_io_name = 'coredns' or app_newrelic_io_name = 'coredns' or k8s_app = 'kube-dns' or job = 'coredns') and prometheus_server IN ( {{ prometheus_server }} ) and instance IN ( {{ instance }} ) FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance, ' , 50th%') LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 300000 SLIDE BY 30000

SELECT rate(sum(coredns_dns_do_requests_total), 1 SECONDS) FROM Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name = 'coredns' or app_newrelic_io_name = 'coredns' or k8s_app = 'kube-dns' or job = 'coredns') and prometheus_server IN ( {{ prometheus_server }} ) and instance IN ( {{ instance }} ) FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance) LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 300000 SLIDE BY 30000

SELECT rate(sum(coredns_dns_requests_total), 1 SECONDS) FROM Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name = 'coredns' or app_newrelic_io_name = 'coredns' or k8s_app = 'kube-dns' or job = 'coredns') and prometheus_server IN ( {{ prometheus_server }} ) and instance IN ( {{ instance }} ) FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance, ' , zone: ', zone) LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 300000 SLIDE BY 30000

SELECT histogrampercentile(coredns_dns_request_size_bytes_bucket, (100 * 0.95)) as 'tcp:95%ile' FROM Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and proto = 'tcp' and (app_kubernetes_io_name = 'coredns' or app_newrelic_io_name = 'coredns' or k8s_app = 'kube-dns' or job = 'coredns') and prometheus_server IN ( {{ prometheus_server }} ) and instance IN ( {{ instance }} ) FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance, ' , 95th%') LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 300000 SLIDE BY 30000

SELECT histogrampercentile(coredns_dns_request_size_bytes_bucket, (100 * 0.50)) as 'tcp:50%ile' FROM Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and proto = 'tcp' and (app_kubernetes_io_name = 'coredns' or app_newrelic_io_name = 'coredns' or k8s_app = 'kube-dns' or job = 'coredns') and prometheus_server IN ( {{ prometheus_server }} ) and instance IN ( {{ instance }} ) FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance, ' , 95th%') LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 300000 SLIDE BY 30000

SELECT rate(sum(coredns_dns_responses_total), 1 SECONDS) as 'Responses per second' from Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name = 'coredns' or app_newrelic_io_name = 'coredns' or k8s_app = 'kube-dns' or job = 'coredns') and prometheus_server IN ( {{ prometheus_server }} ) and instance IN ( {{ instance }} ) FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance) LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 300000 SLIDE BY 30000

SELECT histogrampercentile(coredns_dns_response_size_bytes_bucket, (100 * 0.95)) FROM Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' where proto = 'udp' and (app_kubernetes_io_name = 'coredns' or app_newrelic_io_name = 'coredns' or k8s_app = 'kube-dns' or job = 'coredns') and prometheus_server IN ( {{ prometheus_server }} ) and instance IN ( {{ instance }} ) FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance, ' , 95th%') LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 300000 SLIDE BY 30000

SELECT histogrampercentile(coredns_dns_response_size_bytes_bucket, (100 * 0.50)) FROM Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' where proto = 'udp' and (app_kubernetes_io_name = 'coredns' or app_newrelic_io_name = 'coredns' or k8s_app = 'kube-dns' or job = 'coredns') and prometheus_server IN ( {{ prometheus_server }} ) and instance IN ( {{ instance }} ) FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance, ' , 50th%') LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 300000 SLIDE BY 30000

SELECT histogrampercentile(coredns_dns_response_size_bytes_bucket, (100 * 0.95)) FROM Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' where proto = 'tcp' and (app_kubernetes_io_name = 'coredns' or app_newrelic_io_name = 'coredns' or k8s_app = 'kube-dns' or job = 'coredns') and prometheus_server IN ( {{ prometheus_server }} ) and instance IN ( {{ instance }} ) FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance, ' , 95th%') LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 300000 SLIDE BY 30000

SELECT histogrampercentile(coredns_dns_response_size_bytes_bucket, (100 * 0.50)) FROM Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' where proto = 'tcp' and (app_kubernetes_io_name = 'coredns' or app_newrelic_io_name = 'coredns' or k8s_app = 'kube-dns' or job = 'coredns') and prometheus_server IN ( {{ prometheus_server }} ) and instance IN ( {{ instance }} ) FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance, ' , 95th%') LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 300000 SLIDE BY 30000

SELECT rate(sum(coredns_dns_responses_total), 1 SECONDS) FROM Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name = 'coredns' or app_newrelic_io_name = 'coredns' or k8s_app = 'kube-dns' or job = 'coredns') and prometheus_server IN ( {{ prometheus_server }} ) and instance IN ( {{ instance }} ) FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance, ', rcode: ',rcode) LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 300000 SLIDE BY 30000

SELECT rate(sum(coredns_dns_responses_total), 1 SECONDS) * 60 as 'Responses' FROM Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name = 'coredns' or app_newrelic_io_name = 'coredns' or k8s_app = 'kube-dns' or job = 'coredns') and prometheus_server IN ( {{ prometheus_server }} ) and instance IN ( {{ instance }} ) FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance, ', rcode: ',rcode) LIMIT 100

FROM Metric SELECT sum(coredns_cache_hits_total)/(sum(coredns_cache_misses_total) + sum(coredns_cache_hits_total)) * 100 as 'Cache Hit %' where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name = 'coredns' or app_newrelic_io_name = 'coredns' or k8s_app = 'kube-dns' or job = 'coredns') and prometheus_server IN ( {{ prometheus_server }} ) FACET prometheus_server LIMIT 100

SELECT rate(sum(coredns_cache_hits_total), 1 SECONDS) FROM Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name = 'coredns' or app_newrelic_io_name = 'coredns' or k8s_app = 'kube-dns' or job = 'coredns') and prometheus_server IN ( {{ prometheus_server }} ) and instance IN ( {{ instance }} ) FACET concat(prometheus_server, ' - ', instance, ', type: ', type) LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 300000 SLIDE BY 30000

SELECT (average(coredns_cache_entries) * cardinality(coredns_cache_entries)) FROM Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name = 'coredns' or app_newrelic_io_name = 'coredns' or k8s_app = 'kube-dns' or job = 'coredns') and prometheus_server IN ( {{ prometheus_server }} ) and instance IN ( {{ instance }} ) FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance, ', type: ',type) LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 300000

SELECT rate(sum(coredns_cache_misses_total), 1 SECONDS) as 'Cache misses per second' FROM Metric where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and (app_kubernetes_io_name = 'coredns' or app_newrelic_io_name = 'coredns' or k8s_app = 'kube-dns' or job = 'coredns') and prometheus_server IN ( {{ prometheus_server }} ) and instance IN ( {{ instance }} ) FACET concat(prometheus_server,' - ',instance, ', type: misses') LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 300000 SLIDE BY 30000

nrqlQuery.query: from Metric select uniques(prometheus_server) where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' and metricName like 'coredns_%' since 1 week ago
from Metric select uniques(instance) where metricName like 'coredns_%' since 1 week ago
